title: Looking for a team
body: I am a solid support but sick of the trolls in bronze can play very well happy to listen and work with a team.

replies.body: Currently am bronze 3 player but have been through the ranks to silver and almost gold in pre season. Have been very experienced and work well with teams that are willing to help. First ranked team i joined i was the jungler (rammus) and set up easy kills. We lost because of a disconnect. From then on ranked team just split. Similar things have happened to me and im looking for a team that will actually work. If this is it i will be glad to join.I have played since late season 2 on and off and have had a lot of experience with "impossible games" and have been able to bring them backing by having a positive attitude and trying. On oce server under name thetrollmast3r. And don't worry, I only troll the enemy team.
